Internship Briefing 2024
Pfeiffer Chung
Pfeiffer is an internship specialist with experience in internship and career services spanning more than ten years . holds a specialist diploma in career counselling .
she is passionate about guiding students to enhance their self-awareness to pursue their dream internships and jobs purposefully .
she managed internship programmes and job placements for students spanning across industries . in her previous stint, she managed a variety of internship programmes .
she collaborated with more than 1,000 organisations to secure internship opportunities . she provided career advice and internship briefings to the students .
pfchung@nus.edu.sg . cnn.com.au .

Pre-interview Preparation
when in doubt, dress more formally to make a strong first impression . for corporate roles, wear a suit; for start-ups, business casual may suffice.
list of questions about company culture, role expectations, or professional development opportunities . shows genuine interest in the interviewer .
Know the company, role, and industry to answer questions confidently . know the company's mission, products/services, and competitors .
Securing your Internship
a dedicated job portal for graduate jobs, internships, part-time, and temporary positions across industries . the portal is open to anyone interested in pursuing a career in a specific field .
create a profile page, review account information, upload resumes, cover letters . search for opportunities that match your preferred job function, job type or industry .
Access NUS TalentConnect with your registered email address . Create a free account to access NUS's TalentConnect database .
popular job portals like LinkedIn, Indeed, Glassdoor and AngelList offer a quick and efficient way to find various internship options .
Check out NUS-CFG Career Events . Postgraduate Career Fair 2024 and TalentXperience 2024 organised by ISS .
network to gain access to all the other hidden jobs out there . adopt a multi-pronged approach in your internship/ job search .
Strategise Your Job Search - NUS Centre for Future-ready Graduates . Source: www.nus.edu.au .
